mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.mainImg FROM `product` AS a LEFT JOIN `productimg` AS b ON a.pno = b.pno WHERE b.mainImg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.rdate DESC, a.pno ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT a.*, b.mainImg, c.pcount, c.options FROM `cart` AS c JOIN `product` AS a ON c.pno = a.pno LEFT JOIN `productimg` AS b ON a.pno = b.pno WHERE c.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY c.cno DESC
